title: IU Cricket Team management visits Central Police Office
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 09 (APP):Islamabad United Cricket Team owner Ali Naqvi along with team management visited the Central Police Office and met with Inspector General of Police (IGP) Islamabad Dr Akbar Nasir Khan.
During the meeting the other day, the Islamabad United cricket team invited the children and families of martyrs and Ghazis of Islamabad Police to watch the Pakistan Super League matches. They also paid rich tributes to the sacrifices of the officers and jawans of Islamabad Police.
The owner of the Islamabad United cricket team also presented a souvenir to IGP Islamabad.
